mainSequence.step: Access the homepage by navigating to "/"
Enter the student ID in the login page
Successfully log in and redirect to the dashboard
Click on "Start Quiz" in the dashboard
Navigate to the quiz page using the quiz ID
Retrieve quiz data from the server
Click on "View Results" in the dashboard
Navigate to view the quiz results using the quiz ID
Retrieve quiz results from the server
Click on "Practice Quiz" in the dashboard
Navigate to the practice quiz page using the practice quiz ID
Retrieve randomized quiz data for practice
